185765259.review: As much as Im bad at writing reviews, I would say I give this game a 9/10. Iv played this game years in the past and since I found out about steam, I came back to play. The Dynamic and over all leveling, its awesome. The PvP is well evenly matched, quests pay out for your level, and you can be on guard duty when you are not playing.

185704233.review:
Vecchio browser game che era già vecchio ancora prima che approdasse su Steam.
Si tratta di un classico RPG con finti turni in 2-D, il tutto ci viene presentato con la creazione personaggio dove potremo scegliere razza, classe e potremo costumizzare un pelo l'avatar; subito dopo verremo direttamente buttati nel mezzo del villaggio che tramite tutorial ci inizierà sulle basi del gioco.
Il tutto è divertente anche se molto ripetitivo, portandoci a fare sempre la stessa cosa giorno dopo giorno per accumulare un pò di vantaggio in stats e gear man mano che si va avanti.

185364477.review: Das beste Spiel, wenn du ein Held sein willst, aber zu faul bist, wirklich zu kämpfen :D Hier sammelst du lustige Quests, schicke Gegenstände und jede Menge Gold, während du deinen Helden dabei zusiehst, wie er die Arbeit macht. Es ist wie ein Rollenspiel mit Comedy-Einlage und dein Gegner könnte ein Eichhörnchen sein. Einfach genial. :)

185273181.review: Immer wieder ein sehr guter Lückenfüller. Man kommt immer wieder mal in die Sucht rein. Seit jahren sein gutes Spiel

184861695.review: got 2 level 200 chars, its p2w, no money no progress ez as that. once the money is dry on the server, they just open a new server like EU9083 so they can milk more from the dead cow. Events are strictly pay 2 play/enjoy. Sure you can play as f2p, but it will take you months what over took just a week on a good XP weekend.

184777307.review:
Ein witziges Spiel als Zeitvertreib.
Ich mag die Grafik und die Abwechslung.
Ob bisschen PVP, Duengon oder Bau-/Strategie es ist alles dabei.
Das Tolle ist, dass ich meinen Spielstand auf dem PC sowie auf meinem Handy spielen kann.

Grosses Lob an die Künstler und Entwickler

184740318.review: Leider ziemlich viel Pay to win imo

184726933.review:
1. Let's go gambling! ahh dang it, ah dang it, ah dang it
2. Peer Pressure to keep up high enough level or you get kicked out of guild??> conditioned Commitment to a game that's just pure RNG 
3. Pay money to be higher on a scoreboard/ladder Good Job! you just proved you have more money and less financial responsibility than most people, you bought yourself place on a leaderboard that proves you spent more money(which yeah this exists even in competitive games, boosting in league and all, buying accounts with grinded up rank, but those games at least aren't pure gambling?)
4. FOMO, aka. buy more schrooms so you can make the most of events that give bonuses on quests, you can do more quests with schrooms!
5. hey you're new! let me give you one time only boost to a currency that's behind a paywall so you get used to using it and better ease into buying more of it to upkeep status quo of your gameplay!! (let's go drug test samples to get you addicted)
the only good thing about this game is the lovely graphic design, which could just as much be used to make a comic story or animation and yet this game still stands because people can't not stop spending money on this instead of spending money on idk. getting better at art or something or go to a gym or spend more money on a cool Diet that would make you healthier>look better>higher social scoreboard
